sentences.en: A blade guard is fitted to protect the operator.
sentences.cn: 为保证操作人员的人身安全安装了桨叶保护罩。

sentences.en: A heavily armed guard of police have sealed off the city centre.
sentences.cn: 一队全副武装的警察已经封锁了市中心。

sentences.en: a lioness guarding her cubs
sentences.cn: 守护着幼狮的母狮

sentences.en: Armed soldiers guard the streets in this volatile atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 目前局势动荡不定，有武装士兵在街道上警戒。

sentences.en: He is constantly on guard against any threat of humiliation.
sentences.cn: 他时刻提防着任何有辱尊严之事。

sentences.en: He rang for the guard to let him out.
sentences.cn: 他按铃叫保安放他出去。

sentences.en: he was held in an empty stable under guard.
sentences.cn: 他被关在一个有警卫看守的空马厩里。

sentences.en: He's more like a film star than a life-guard, really.
sentences.cn: 真的，与其说他像救生员，不如说他更像电影明星。

sentences.en: One young policeman stood guard outside the locked embassy gates.
sentences.cn: 一位年轻的警察在大门紧闭的使馆外站岗。

sentences.en: Only a uniformed guard stultified with boredom might have overheard them.
sentences.cn: 只有一名穿制服的无聊警卫可能偷听到了他们的谈话。

sentences.en: Outside each door a guard sprang to attention as they approached.
sentences.cn: 当他们走近时，每扇门外都有一名卫兵肃身立正。

sentences.en: Security cameras have been installed to guard against poachers.
sentences.cn: 已安装了安全摄像头来监视偷猎者。

sentences.en: The call-up of National Guard and reserve units begun in late August.
sentences.cn: 国民警卫队和预备役的征兵工作8月下旬开始。

sentences.en: the government was caught off guard by the unexpected announcement.
sentences.cn: 政府被这突如其来的声明弄得措手不及。

sentences.en: The guard dog was now in kennels as it was not aggressive.
sentences.cn: 这条看门狗不好斗，因此正在养狗场受训。

sentences.en: The guard eyeballed him pretty hard despite his pass.
sentences.cn: 虽然他有通行证，卫兵还是直勾勾地盯着他。

sentences.en: The guard stopped his humming and turned his head sharply.
sentences.cn: 守卫停止了哼唱，猛地转过头。

sentences.en: The prisoners overpowered their guards and locked them in a cell.
sentences.cn: 囚犯们制服了卫兵，并把他们锁在一个牢房里。

sentences.en: The Sergeant told Swift to guard the entrance.
sentences.cn: 中士叫斯威夫特守着入口。

sentences.en: There were two security guards on duty outside the building.
sentences.cn: 大楼外面有两名保安在值勤。

sentences.en: We have a security guard around the whole area.
sentences.cn: 我们在该地区各处部署了保安。
